message.raw:
Removed unnecessary calls to Tab._update_error().

Since _update_error() also updates the tab icon, renamed it to
_update_error_and_tab_icon(), and renamed update_tab_icon_and_colour() to
set_tab_icon_and_colour() to differentiate it, since it is more about
setting the icon and colour rather than figuring out what the icon and colour
should be.

message:
Removed unnecessary calls to Tab._update_error().

Since _update_error() also updates the tab icon, renamed it to
_update_error_and_tab_icon(), and renamed update_tab_icon_and_colour() to
set_tab_icon_and_colour() to differentiate it, since it is more about
setting the icon and colour rather than figuring out what the icon and colour
should be.
